text: Management just informed me that the next hero needs a pick me up.
Come on, last one and we’re off. Can’t wait to get home to a good episode of the Little Dungeon in the Cavern.
You now have gems and hearts to place. They give a bonus score, so use them when you have your highest multiplier!
Do you ever wonder WHERE the hearts come from? I try not too.

Good job, that was the final wave. Well, for a first day, you did… Wait, someone’s coming... who’s there? YOU’RE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE HERE! Haha, I mean, we’re sorry milady but... the dungeon is, ahem, closed for today… We’re terribly sorry, but, please-don’t-get-angry-please-don’t-get-angry, you have to come back tomo… PLEASE DON’T ATTACK OUR EMPLO… Oh, who’s gonna clean that up now?!!!
